description:
Kaoru takes Aoi to a certain place but doesn`t tell her where they will be going. Finally they arrive in a little town where Kaoru leads Aoi to the cemetery - and to the tombstone of the Honjyou family, the grave of his mother.
On the next day Miyabi takes Aoi home to the Sakuraba family without telling her why. Aoi wants Kaoru not to worry as she will be back in time for the autumnal moon watching for the day after tomorrow.
